sentences: Frederico Guedes de Freitas (born Lisbon, Portugal; 15 November 1902 â€“ 12 January 1980) was a Portuguese composer, conductor, musicologist, and pedagogue.
De Freitas studied at the National Conservatory, winning the Composition Prize in 1926 for his Nocturno for cello and piano.
In 1940 he created the Lisbon Choral Society, and from 1949 to 1953 he led the Oporto Symphony.
